locations.name: Entrance Tunnel
locations.description: The main entrance to the old mines, a wide tunnel supported by aged wooden beams. The air is cool and damp, and the sound of dripping water echoes from within.
locations.accessibility: Easily accessible from Ember Hollow; the tunnel slopes gently downward.

npcs.name: Old Miner Gregor
npcs.description: An elderly miner who warns adventurers about the dangers within.

plotHooks: Gregor mentions strange noises coming from deeper within the mines.

features.name: Mine Cart Tracks
features.description: Old, rusted tracks that lead deeper into the mines.

features.name: Support Beams
features.description: Aged wooden beams supporting the tunnel ceiling.

dcChecks: Perception DC 10: Notice faint footprints heading towards the Collapsed Passage (R3).

locations.name: Abandoned Mining Office
locations.description: A derelict room filled with the remnants of a once-thriving operation. The air is thick with dust, and broken furniture lies strewn about, hinting at a hasty departure. Papers and ledgers, now yellowed with age, are scattered across the floor, and the scent of mildew permeates the space.
locations.accessibility: Accessible via a side passage from the Entrance Tunnel.
plotHooks: Old mining ledgers might reveal hidden caches.
Signs of recent activity suggest others have been here.

traps.name: Rusted Bear Trap
traps.description: A rusted bear trap hidden under a pile of debris. Automatically brought into play if the party searches the room.

features.name: Broken Safe
features.description: A small safe that appears to have been forced open.

features.name: Wooden Cabinet
features.description: A large wooden cabinet with slightly ajar doors.

features.name: Faded Wall Map
features.description: A map pinned to the wall, partially obscured by dust and faded with time.

features.name: Desk with Drawers
features.description: An old desk with several drawers, some partially open.

features.name: Rusted Filing Cabinet
features.description: An old, rusted filing cabinet pushed against one wall.

features.name: Broken Lantern
features.description: A broken lantern lying on the floor.

dcChecks: Investigation DC 12: Search for hidden compartments or secret documents.
Perception DC 15: Notice signs of recent disturbance in the dust and debris.

doors.name: Office Door
doors.description: A wooden door hanging off its hinges.

locations.name: Collapsed Passage
locations.description: A narrow corridor choked with rubble and debris from a long-ago cave-in. The air is heavy with dust, and the sound of small rocks shifting underfoot echoes eerily through the tight space.
locations.accessibility: Difficult terrain due to rubble; squeezing required.
plotHooks: Signs of recent excavation might indicate valuable discoveries.

features.name: Partially Collapsed Ceiling
features.description: The ceiling here has collapsed, making passage hazardous.

features.name: Rubble Pile
features.description: A large pile of rocks and debris from the cave-in.

features.name: Narrow Passage
features.description: A tight squeeze between two large boulders.

dcChecks: Athletics DC 12: Climb over a particularly large pile of rubble.
Perception DC 10: Notice scurrying sounds indicating the presence of rats.
Investigation DC 15: Spot signs of recent movement or excavation in the debris.

locations.name: Gas Pocket Chamber
locations.description: A chamber where the air smells foul. Pockets of flammable gas seep from cracks in the walls.
locations.accessibility: Accessible via the Collapsed Passage; caution required due to gas.
plotHooks: The gas pockets might be connected to deeper, more dangerous areas.

features.name: Gas Vents
features.description: Cracks in the walls where flammable gas leaks into the chamber.

features.name: Bubbling Pool
features.description: A small pool of water that occasionally bubbles due to gas.

dcChecks: Nature DC 12: Identify the gas as flammable.
Perception DC 10: Notice the faint hissing of gas escaping.

locations.name: Fire Beetle Nest
locations.description: A warm chamber illuminated by the glow of several fire beetles. The floor is littered with beetle shells.
locations.accessibility: Accessible from the Gas Pocket Chamber.
plotHooks: The unusual concentration of fire beetles might indicate a heat source nearby.
lootTable: A small pouch with 10 copper pieces

features.name: Beetle Shells
features.description: Discarded shells that crunch underfoot.

features.name: Glowing Rocks
features.description: Some rocks in the chamber glow with residual heat.

dcChecks: Stealth DC 13: Move quietly to avoid disturbing the beetles.
Nature DC 12: Identify safe ways to harvest fire beetle glands.

locations.name: Equipment Storage
locations.description: A room filled with old mining equipment: pickaxes, shovels, and helmets. Many items are rusted or broken.
locations.accessibility: Accessible from the Fire Beetle Nest.
plotHooks: Some equipment seems to have been recently moved or used.

features.name: Crate of Helmets
features.description: A crate containing a few usable miner's helmets.

features.name: Tool Rack
features.description: A rack on the wall with various mining tools.

features.name: Barrel of Lamp Oil
features.description: A barrel that might still contain some usable lamp oil.

dcChecks: Investigation DC 10: Find usable equipment among the junk.
Perception DC 15: Notice signs of recent activity in the room.

doors.name: Storage Room Door
doors.description: A sturdy wooden door, slightly ajar.

locations.name: Hidden Passage
locations.description: A narrow, concealed passageway that seems to have been recently used. The walls are marked with strange symbols.
locations.accessibility: Hidden entrance from Equipment Storage; requires perception to find.
plotHooks: The symbols on the walls might be related to the Ember Enclave's activities.
lootTable: A note detailing plans to reactivate the Elemental Forge

traps.name: Alarm Trap
traps.description: A tripwire that alerts nearby Enclave members.

features.name: Strange Symbols
features.description: Symbols carved into the walls, glowing faintly.

features.name: Narrow Squeeze
features.description: A particularly tight section of the passage.

dcChecks: Perception DC 15: Detect the hidden entrance from Equipment Storage.
Arcana DC 12: Identify the symbols as elemental in nature.

locations.name: Underground Stream
locations.description: A cavern bisected by a flowing underground stream. The water is cold and clear. The sound of rushing water echoes off the damp, stone walls.
locations.accessibility: Accessible from the Collapsed Passage; requires crossing the stream.
plotHooks: The stream might lead to hidden underwater passages.
lootTable: A waterproof satchel containing a map of the mines

features.name: Stone Bridge
features.description: A slippery natural stone bridge crosses the stream.

features.name: Waterfall
features.description: A small waterfall cascades from a higher level of the cavern.

dcChecks: Acrobatics DC 12: Cross the slippery stone bridge without falling.
Perception DC 14: Spot any unusual features or items in the water.

locations.name: Ore Processing Room
locations.description: An area with old, rusted equipment used for processing mined ore. There are signs of recent activity.
locations.accessibility: Accessible from the Underground Stream.
plotHooks: Evidence of the Ember Enclave's presence and their mining operations.

features.name: Active Forge
features.description: A small forge that has been recently used.

features.name: Ore Crushing Machine
features.description: A large, partially rusted machine for crushing ore.

dcChecks: Investigation DC 14: Determine what the Enclave is crafting.
Stealth DC 12: Move through the room without alerting any Enclave members.

doors.name: Heavy Iron Door
doors.description: A sturdy iron door leading to the Guard Post.

locations.name: Ember Enclave Guard Post
locations.description: A fortified room where members of the Ember Enclave stand watch.
locations.accessibility: Accessible through the locked door from the Ore Processing Room.
plotHooks: Overheard conversations might reveal the Enclave's plans.

features.name: Weapon Rack
features.description: A rack holding swords and spears.

features.name: Guard Table
features.description: A table where guards take their meals and play games during downtime.

dcChecks: Stealth DC 15: Sneak past the guards unnoticed.
Perception DC 12: Overhear guard conversations or notice patrol patterns.

doors.name: Reinforced Door
doors.description: A heavy door that is usually kept locked.

locations.name: Crystal Cavern
locations.description: A beautiful cavern filled with glowing crystals that illuminate the room with a soft light.
locations.accessibility: Accessible from the Guard Post.
plotHooks: Crystals may be key to understanding the Enclave's rituals.

features.name: Crystal Formation
features.description: Large crystals growing from the floor and ceiling.

features.name: Reflective Pool
features.description: A small pool of water reflecting the crystal lights.

dcChecks: Arcana DC 15: Understand the magical properties of the crystals.
Perception DC 14: Notice any hidden passages or valuable crystal clusters.

locations.name: Abandoned Shaft
locations.description: A deep shaft with a rickety wooden platform and old ropes. The air is cold and stale.
locations.accessibility: Requires climbing gear or careful navigation.
plotHooks: The shaft might lead to undiscovered areas of the mine.
lootTable: A miner's helmet with a functional light

features.name: Rickety Platform
features.description: An unstable platform that could collapse under weight.

features.name: Old Pulley System
features.description: A rusted pulley system, possibly still functional.

dcChecks: Athletics DC 14: Climb the shaft safely.
Perception DC 12: Notice weak points in the platform or useful items.

locations.name: Waterlogged Tunnels
locations.description: Tunnels partially submerged in water. The air is damp, and the sound of dripping water is constant.
locations.accessibility: Requires wading through waist-deep water.
plotHooks: The flooding might be connected to a larger water source or magical effect.
lootTable: An old chest containing 20 gold pieces

features.name: Submerged Debris
features.description: Hidden obstacles beneath the water surface.

features.name: Air Pocket
features.description: A small cavern with breathable air above the water level.

dcChecks: Perception DC 13: Spot the Water Weird before it attacks.
Athletics DC 12: Navigate through the water without stumbling.

locations.name: Hidden Entrance to Dwarven Complex
locations.description: A well-hidden doorway carved into the rock, adorned with ancient dwarven runes. Signs of a fierce battle are evident: scorch marks on the walls, broken weapons, and dried bloodstains. The entrance shows multiple attempts at forced entry, with deep gouges in the stone and shattered mining equipment scattered about. The figure of a larger than life dwarven soldier is carved intricately in the stone wall. A recently deceased corpse, no more than 2 weeks aged, lies near the door, its rotting fingers still clutching a worn journal.
locations.dmInstructions: The part would be unaware of the stone guardian unless they make a skill check to investigate the statue in the wall. If the party attempts to break down the door or perform a lock pick then a stone guardian is automatically triggered. If the party has a dwarf in its company, the party has one attempt to perform a skill check to convince the guardian to allow them to provide the password. If unsuccessful, the stone guardian automatically becomes hostile. Otherwise, if the party successfully solves the puzzle, the stone guardian appears from inside the wall and directs the party to provide the password or leave else they face certain death.
locations.accessibility: Accessible via the Hidden Passage; requires solving a puzzle to open.
plotHooks: The dwarven runes hold clues about the complex beyond.

The corpse's journal contains vital information about the entrance puzzle. If the party knows of the password provided by the miner then the journal confirms as much but that the corpse must have gotten it wrong. If the party has discovered the three possible words from the library, then this journal either narrows the word down to two or one depending on how many other clues have been found.
Signs of failed forced entry indicate the importance of solving the puzzle correctly.
lootTable: Worn journal with partial puzzle solution

features.name: Dwarven Runes
features.description: Ancient runes that glow faintly when approached, forming part of the door's locking mechanism.

features.name: Circular Stone Door
features.description: A massive stone door with five concentric rings, each engraved with dwarven runes. The rings can be rotated to form different combinations.

features.name: Battle Aftermath
features.description: Signs of a fierce battle, including scorch marks, broken weapons, and dried bloodstains.

features.name: Rotting Corpse
features.description: Upon searching the body, the party will discover the deceased was a member of the Ember Enclave.

dcChecks: Investigation DC 15: Piece together the events of the battle from the surrounding evidence.
History DC 14: Recognize the significance of the dwarven runes and their role in the locking mechanism.
Perception DC 16: Notice subtle clues in the carvings that hint at the correct sequence for solving the puzzle.

doors.name: Hidden Dwarven Door
doors.description: A circular stone door concealed within the rock face, featuring five rotatable rings with dwarven runes.
doors.keyname: Correct Rune Sequence and Spoken Word

locations.name: Ancient Dwarven Shrine
locations.description: A small, ornate chamber dedicated to dwarven deities. Ancient carvings and faded murals adorn the walls.
locations.accessibility: Hidden passage from the Entrance Tunnel.
plotHooks: The shrine might hold clues about the history of the mines and the dwarven complex.

features.name: Dwarven Altar
features.description: A stone altar with intricate carvings, radiating faint magical energy.

features.name: Wall Murals
features.description: Faded murals depicting dwarven history and deities.

dcChecks: Religion DC 14: Interpret the significance of the shrine's symbols and deities.
Arcana DC 13: Sense and understand the magical properties of the altar.

locations.name: Forgotten Library
locations.description: A dust-covered room filled with ancient tomes and scrolls. Many of the books are in dwarven script.
locations.accessibility: Connected to the Ancient Dwarven Shrine and Abandoned Mining Office.
plotHooks: The books might contain valuable information about the mines and the artifact.
lootTable: Scroll of an ancient dwarven spell

features.name: Towering Bookshelves
features.description: Tall shelves filled with ancient books and scrolls.

features.name: Reading Desk
features.description: A large desk with intricate carvings, suitable for studying tomes.

dcChecks: Investigation DC 15: Find books relevant to the current quest or the mine's history.
History DC 13: Recognize the significance of certain tomes or scrolls.

locations.name: Enchanted Forge
locations.description: A large chamber housing an ancient dwarven forge. The air shimmers with residual magic.
locations.accessibility: Connected to the Hidden Passage and Forgotten Library.
plotHooks: The forge might be capable of creating or repairing powerful magical items.

features.name: Enchanted Anvil
features.description: A massive anvil crackling with magical energy.

features.name: Elemental Bellows
features.description: Magical bellows that can summon elemental flames.

dcChecks: Arcana DC 16: Understand how to safely use the magical forge.
History DC 14: Recall lore about ancient dwarven forging techniques.

locations.name: Subterranean Garden
locations.description: A surprisingly lush garden thriving in a large underground cavern. Bioluminescent plants provide soft illumination.
locations.accessibility: Connected to the Underground Stream.
plotHooks: Some of the plants might have unusual magical properties.
lootTable: Seeds of an unknown plant species

features.name: Crystal-Clear Pool
features.description: A small pool of crystal-clear water that seems to nourish the garden.

features.name: Giant Mushroom Grove
features.description: A cluster of oversized, colorful mushrooms.

dcChecks: Nature DC 14: Identify rare or magical plants in the garden.
Survival DC 12: Forage for edible or medicinal plants.

locations.name: Ember Enclave War Room
locations.description: A well-organized room filled with maps, plans, and strategic documents. This appears to be the heart of the Ember Enclave's operations.
locations.accessibility: Connected to the Ember Enclave Guard Post and Subterranean Garden.
plotHooks: The plans and maps here could reveal the full extent of the Ember Enclave's activities.
lootTable: Detailed map of the entire mine complex

traps.name: Alarm Rune
traps.description: A magical rune that triggers an alarm if an unauthorized person enters.
traps.damage: None; alerts all nearby Enclave members

features.name: Strategy Table
features.description: A large table with a detailed 3D map of the mine complex.

features.name: Arcane Communication Array
features.description: A set of magical devices used for long-distance communication.

dcChecks: Investigation DC 15: Decipher the Enclave's plans and strategies.
Arcana DC 14: Understand the function of the magical devices in the room.

doors.name: Reinforced War Room Door
doors.description: A heavy iron door with magical wards.

locations.name: Time-Locked Vault
locations.description: A mysterious chamber sealed by an intricate time-based locking mechanism. The air here feels charged with temporal energy.
locations.accessibility: Connected to the Abandoned Shaft, requires solving a time-based puzzle to enter.
plotHooks: The vault might contain a crucial component needed to safely enter the dwarven stronghold.

traps.name: Temporal Displacement Trap
traps.description: A magical trap that briefly shifts the victim through time.
traps.damage: 3d10 force damage and target is incapacitated for 1 round

features.name: Time-Locked Door
features.description: A door covered in constantly shifting temporal runes.

features.name: Temporal Sundial
features.description: A complex mechanism in the center of the room that controls the locking mechanism.

dcChecks: Arcana DC 18: Understand the principles behind the time-locking mechanism.
Intelligence DC 16: Solve the time-based puzzle to open the vault.

doors.name: Time-Locked Vault Door
doors.description: A door that only opens when the correct temporal sequence is input.
